metadata.title: CVE-2020-6445 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in trusted types in Google Chrome prior to81.0.4044.92 allowed a remote attacker to bypass content security policyvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
